Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
12.11.2014 SH SCR19322 C: Added update INVS_SFIP_REFERENCE = SFIP_REFERENCE
27.10.2014 GB SCR19276 C. Prepare payment specification: Removed SFIP_BENEFICIARYCODE = INVS_SUPPLIERID from test existing and
changed value of update SFIP_REFERENCE
23.09.2014 SH SCR19140 Changed update of PAIN_SEPA fields (now fetched from CLBA instead from DEBC);
Changed some updates of SFIP fields
14.07.2014 SH SCR19014 Renamed program "BSF100-16D DIA Spain Direct debit" in "BSF100-16C ING Direct Spain Direct debit"
and added test on INVS_CLNTNO=60130 (DIA Spain) to set PAIN_AMOUNT and to store second PAIN row
06.06.2014 SH SCR18936 Added update INVS_MT101_CLNA_ID=999999999 when a PAIN row is stored
01.05.2014 JH SCR18865 Added Select SFIP and Select SFIN
24.04.2014 SH SCR18856 Introduced INVS_DIRECTDEBITDATE (Used instead INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE)
26.03.2014 SH SCR18798 Extended update PAIN_DESCRIPTION with leading '625' first PAIN row, '623' second PAIN row
06.03.2014 SH SCR18761 Changed range on INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE (now <= GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE + SBUY_PREADVICEDAYS)
18.02.2014 SH SCR18732 Changed update PAIN_DESCRIPTION (now only with INVS_RECEIVABLENUMBER)
-- A. Prepare direct debit instruction invoice
B. Prepare direct debit instruction interest amount
-- Calc PAIN_ID
-- Final update INVS (only for first call of subtask)
-- Calc SFIP_ID
-- Calc SFIN_ID
